channel.title: Die Satanistic Gargoyle
channel.description: It was just a teenager.. Oh well.. ![image|467x500](/uploads/default/original/2X/a/a1074fc2913d455cff602879f63b5deeaff788d0.jpg) - So while playing as a hunter, I killed an Unseen, they were just a teenager, but an Unseen nonetheless, we can not have mercy if we wishst to survive this mutiny.

item.title: Die Satanistic Gargoyle
item.dc:creator: Dooku
item.description:
It was just a teenager… Oh well…

So while playing as a hunter, I killed an Unseen, they were just a teenager, but an Unseen nonetheless, we can not have mercy if we wishst to survive this mutiny.
